text:
If I want to tell request the character encoding of parameters at JSP,
I'll be able to write request.setCharacterEncoding() in scriptlet.

But following code doesn't work.

<%
request.setCharacterEncoding("UTF-8");
%>
<%@ page contentType="text/html; charset=ISO-2022-JP" %>
<HTML>
  :

Whenever the scriptlet is executed, the ServetRequest is in a "parsed" state.
creator: shin@sk-jp.com

text:
Unfortunately in a jsp the request paramaters are already in a parsed state.
There are two simple workarounds though:

- set the character encoding in a scriptlet and forward to the jsp file
- use a filter to set the character encoding before executing the jsp file
